item.description:
From Cambridge Common: Help us celebrate our 12th Leapin' Birthday Celebration - February, 29th (it's on freakin' leap day!) It's taken us 12 years to celebrate three birthdays, so you better mark your calendars and be here, as we hope to have a special beer for each year we have been in business; 12 beers for 12 years, woo-hoo! We'll also have some snacks and t-shirts, to honor this one-of-a-kind birthday bash.

From me: Cambridge Common has tons of great stuff on tap and in bottles... and they offer a sampler! There's a nice pub menu that looks really reasonable.

For more information on the location, check out the website: http://www.cambridgec...

Once I get a heads up on interest, I'll contact Cambridge Common to find out what time this shindig actually starts.

Looking forward to seeing you all soon!
item.how_to_find_us: We're going to get a table. Just ask the hostess for the Meetup group and they'll send you our way!
item.why: You should come because Cambridge Common has a great selection of beers, and you'll get to hang out with all your Beer Meetup chums! Feel free to bring friends.
item.name: Cambridge Common Turns 12
